channel.title: News on Vidhisha Balachandran
channel.description: Recent content in News on Vidhisha Balachandran

item.title: News
item.description: [21/01/24] Check out 2 new preprints on Fine-Grained Hallucination in LLMs and Preserving Perspectives in News Summarization. [18/01/24] Our paper Knowledge Card: Filling LLMs’ Knowledge Gaps with Plug-in Specialized Language Models was accepted to ICLR 2024 as an Oral! See you in Vienna! [12/01/23] Gave a talk on Understanding and Mitigating Factual Inconsistencies in Language Generation at the Deep Learning: Classics and Trends Reading Group! Thank you for having me!
